title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: #DOOMBOTS?
Doombots of Doom should be a permanent addition to the game. It's a Co-op vs. AI game mode after all. Intro, Beginner and Intermediate bots will still remain for those not up to the challenge.
yeah it actually should… it's the only way anyone has ever lost to bots… Don't go looking in my match history to confirm that….
WE NEED DOOMBOTS !!!
_**DOOM BOTS ARE THE ONLY ONE IM HYPE FOR******_
Yeah i wasn't around for doom bots the first time it would be fun to see fun it was playing against op as crap AIs
WHERE ARE THEY!!!!!!!!
This needs to be a permanent rotating queue. Been playing for 6 years and this would be the best thing that has happened to league imho.
I third this. Especially since I am going to be gone the weekend URF is out...{{summoner:3}}
Agreed. There are a lot of people unhappy that this will only be available on weekends--myself included. I need my Ascension fix :/
As someone whose busiest time of the week is the weekend I wholeheartedly support this.
I second this.
Do I find it hilarious that the first game mode was on the map that Rito has removed from the game? Answer: HECK YEAH!
I'm pretty sure that's why they did it

> Ascension: 4/8 to 4/10
> 
> Poro King: 4/15 to 4/17
> 
> URF: 4/22 to 4/24
> 
> Hexakill: 4/29 to 5/1


These are going to be fun weekends.
URF is coming two times, but both times it's coming for 2 days... 4 days of URF... We used to have 2 weeks :'(
> The said if the gamemodes prove to be exceedingly popular they may extend how long they are available.

"If" they are "exceedingly" popular they "may" extend. All words used to signify that it's unlikely when used by companies, to be honest. They could easily say it wasn't exceedingly enough, since it's a vague term. They could easily decide not to, simply because it makes them more money to have it on the weekends.

I'm not saying it WON'T happen, but it's wise of the player base to voice their disapproval of the current system. That's how you get things changed. If people don't voice their opinions, then their opinions can't be heard.

I'm fairly certain in no way shape or form having the game modes strictly on the weekends makes them any more or less money :/ stop trying to use money as an excuse for literally everything Riot does. If Riot was truly just a money grubbing company they'd finally slap a price tag on League and make us all pay for it. Or they would make content that enhances game play in the form of stat boosting that costs actual money instead of IP. Until they do something like these, I think the money excuse is a poor one, and whenever you think of using it again, in the words of a great wise man, here's an idea...

Just don't. {{summoner:21}}

Actually it does. It's called marketing, my friend. It's as I've said before, I do not blame them for doing it 'because' it makes them more money. They are first and foremost a company. I'm just not going to pretend they're doing it with other thoughts in mind.

By having it on the weekends, they get spikes. The majority excitement fades after a day or two. Having more opportunities to have that 1~3 days of excitement fuels people to want to buy X skin to use for Y gamemode. That's what excitement does, it makes people excited.

By having it on for the whole week it would garner less overall profit, because the excitement wouldn't be as high on the peek days, and would trail off more quickly. The enjoyment people get from the modes would be increased overall, yes. But the level of peek excitement just isn't the same.

It is a very smart marketing plan to limit the amount a thing is available, to the times it will make the most money through the excitement of the consumer.

and then riot asks themselves why players are quitting LoL.. we have the same game modes every time (Armam and Summoners Rift normal (who plays twisted treeline anymore?))
they should just rotate them for the whole year, at least just the weekends to dispose all the salt in our bodies and just relax in fun game modes..
I play twisted treeline all the time, nobody wants to learn the strategy of it, it's sad really {{item:3070}}
All I saw was URF
URF The weekend before exams. {{item:3070}}

Its like if rito wants me to hate them.

1. No urf on April 1st
2. Urf is not first on the rotating gamemodes crap
3. Urf is not even gonna be second because they gonna put a gamemode we just had on Dec...

Am about to be done with these people

rito doesnt know who you are, so i doubt it

1 it was April 1, if you honestly thought URF was actually going to come I dont know what to tell ya, other than no
2 why would they make their best game mode first, and all the other ones come after it? thats like giving someone the best tasting cheese burger ever then giving them burgers with out the meat after
3 "Just had on Dec"? dude its april, 3 months later, if you honestly think April and December are close you must have just stepped out of a hyperbolic time chamber
Am done with humans {{champion:35}}

IMO urf is like a broken tradition. Riot has no real reason for breaking this tradition, or they haven't told us why at least, so naturally some people are going to be angry. I understand not having urf as a permanent game mode but not even having it on the weekend of April 1st is a bit cruel. Honestly I understand the frustration the least they could have done is put urf first there isn't really a reason for making people wait. {{champion:32}}

I don't know if I would consider something done only twice in a row a tradition. and i think it is better to be a week or two later. That way more players are aware of the weekend when the most popular game mode will take place.
We need more people like you in this community, have an upvote
So let's say I'm a Xerath main, what happens if I play him in this game mode?
literally you would kys
Will DoomBots ever comeback ? {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:99}}  ?? :c
Can we be expecting any combination gamemodes? Like One-For-All+URF (One-For-URF). Or One-For-All+Hexakill (Hex-For-All). Or URF+Ascension (URFscension)?

URF Bots of Doom.
'Nuff said.
It's 4/10 and ascension is already gone? The home page literally says, "play ascension now!" and it's not available. Great work rito.
Logged in literally just to upvote this, just got off work came home all excited and now logging off LL...Gj riot. At least post the goodbye page first before I jump on...

Finally, time to break out my perfect Ascension icon.

By the way, do the urf summoner icons from last year work if we use them this year? I wanna drop lasers on my defeated victims.

How can you make the best game mode in the rotation during pax weekend! WE GO THERE TO SUPPORT YOU GUYS AND YOU MAKE IT SO NONE OF US CAN PLAY THE BEST MODE!
That's kinda wrong....

please for the love of all that is holy in LoL make this last forever with the rotating game mode. If you honestly care about your player base do it! Never get rid of it and never even think of getting rid of it. This was the most fun I have had in my month of playing LoL and everyone is just like so happy with it that the toxicity in my games are so low that I can actually enjoy talking with people without having to mute the toxic players!
for all of us who are adults with jobs this sucks.... -_- i work on the weekend from the morning till night time :/.... im only home now cause im sick. why cant we just have weekly rotations?

Instead of having them only on weekends, why not change them to every 3 days? 
Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday URF mode.
Thursday, Friday, Saturday One for all.
Sunday, Monday, Tuesday Hexakill and so on.

That way, they'll stay short but will return often so everyone can get to play them. 

But with the current schedule, the game modes don't last for long and on top of that some people can't play on weekends, so they'd miss out all the fun. 

So it'd be nice if you could change it.

Thanks

"(we’ll shut it down very early Monday morning--usually between 1:00 AM and 3:00 AM)" 

12pm SHARP

No Doom bots of Doom?

Aaaaaaaaand it's gone.
Well...that was too short. Yeah this whole "only on weekends" thing is pretty awful. The rotating queue is a great idea, but maybe a week at a time instead? I'd rather have a week off and a week on than every week but only the week ends.
